room_title: Escape room "The Vault" by Unchained STL in St. Louis
review: Just finished our first escape at this location - we will be back!!! Clean, professional, no nonsense puzzles. Loved it! Lindsay was a great hostess - responsive and fun. There was enough for everyone to do so no one was standing around. Good story; great props. Can't wait to bring my girls scouts here for their detective badge.

room_title: Escape room "The Vault" by Unchained STL in St. Louis
review: The vault got the best of us but we had a wonderful time.

room_title: Escape room "The Vault" by Unchained STL in St. Louis
review: Had a blast working together with my girls to try and crack the vault. Owners were so cool and so nice. You gotta try it!
